title: DD Game Card position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab on the DD launch date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Diamond Derby’s game card has the topmost position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab a week after the DD launch date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Diamond Derby’s game card has the 2nd top position

title: Game Card - unlocked state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in 
AND user is on the Game tab
AND games have unlocked state (scheduled or live)
custom_expected: THEN user should display with Diamond Derby game card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the DD card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* Diamond Derby logo in the center
* 100 XP on the bottom left corner
* 5 token on the bottom left corner next to XP
* blue background image
* Presented by *sponsor*

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the game loop

title: Game Card - locked state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in 
AND user is on the Game tab
AND games have locked state (all games are final)
custom_expected: THEN user should display with Diamond Derby game card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the DD card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* Diamond Derby logo in the center
* 100 XP on the bottom left corner
* 5 token on the bottom left corner next to XP
* blue background image
* lock icon is displayed in the top right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the game loop

title: EOG push notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user has notification ON
custom_steps:
WHEN user play Diamond Derby 
AND all contests are final for the Day
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive a push notification for a contest complete user event 
AND the push notification copy should be randomly selected from this document (Any game and DD only sections)https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oAVua_nZlopAzWljnOQAcAoWGljhdvf9dy45cKE2qIA/edit

title: DD launch notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user has notification on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Diamond Derby is launched
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a push notification

Title: New MLB Play Game

Body: 💎 We’ve got a new game available for you to play now. See if you can pick the winning team for each day’s game in Diamond Derby.

title: DD Results (copy to add)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND User logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played the Diamond Derby contest 
AND all contests are final
custom_expected:
THEN user should be displayed with Results in Results tab 

* Users avatar with outline
* 'You' bubble
* date in m/d format on the top right corner
* Diamond Derby logo
* Result description
* XP earned (user will receive 100 XP for playing even if no correct picks)
* token earned (user will receive 5 tokens for each correct pick)

title: User view the Result when Not playing contest for the day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Play app installed on device
AND User logged in
AND User did not played Diamond Derby for the day 



THEN user should display with Results in Result tab
custom_steps: WHEN user DID NOT played the Diamond Derby contest
custom_expected:
THEN user display with
X Icon on top left 
Date(MM/DD) Results 

Sort Description ( You did not submit any picks. Make correct picks to move along the base paths and score runs! 

See Past pick results by pressing the back arrow in the date bar.

title: User gets the Results on Strikeout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Play app installed on device
AND User logged in
AND User did played Diamond Derby for the day
custom_steps:
WHEN user played Diamond Derby 
AND received results when they have earned bases and Strike Out
custom_expected:
THEN user should display with 
X Icon on top left 
MM/DD Results 

Sort description (i.e. You earned 6 bases and Struck Out!) 

Background image

title: EC - token value
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user has played Diamond Derby
custom_steps: WHEN user made correct picks for all 15 games
custom_expected: THEN user should receive 75 tokens for 15 games

title: Customizable Prizing Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed with 

* Title 'Leaderboard'
* X icon on the top right corner
* Diamond Derby logo
* sponsor logo
* token icon + amount (5)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on the X icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User should be taken back to the gameloop

title: Leaderboard segment controller
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
custom_expected: Leaderboards should be able to filter between the Friends /All time leaderboard.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* Friends and All leaderboards
AND both leaderboards should have 3 subsegments
* Yesterday (Bases)
* Today (Bases)
* Season (Runs)

THEN the leaderboard should always defaulted to Friends
AND selected leaderboard should have a blue underline
AND user should be able to switch between All and Friends segment
AND user should be presented with the total number of users to the right of the leaderboard name in the segment controller

title: 'You' cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user first opens the leaderboard 
AND the user is in the first set of visible ranks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the default view shows the top of the leaderboard (starting with position 1) AND the user’s position is highlighted light grey

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is scrolled to a position that is less than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell sticks at the bottom of the leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'you' cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to their position in the leaderboard and the position is centered on the page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls to the user’s position in the leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell will slot into the correct position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is scrolled to a position that is greater than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell sticks at the top of the leaderboard

title: Page scrolling
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard - All segment AND/OR Friends segment
custom_expected:
THEN User is able to scroll to the next or previous set of data without any issues 
AND Page is displayed fully while scrolling and top and bottom of the page does not get cut off

title: Leaderboard Empty States UI - user has no friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user selects Leaderboard
custom_expected: THEN User should display with empty State version of the page instead of blank page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Friends segment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 0 should be displayed to the right of 'Freidns'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the empty Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with- 

* leaderboard image
* copy 'There aren't any scores to display. 
Invite some friends to play! '
* Invite Friends CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Invite Friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with the native share sheet, pre-filled with our custom language.

The copy in the share sheet should read “Let's compete on mLB Play” + options where user can send an invite.

title: Empty State display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND user selects Leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user HAS A SCORE
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show the leaderboard no matter what.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has no score BUT has friends
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show the leaderboard.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has NO FRIENDS AND NO SCORE
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show empty state

title: Inviting Friends - user has friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has friends

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard -> Friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the 'Invite Freinds' cell 
AND the cell isn’t “sticky”
AND it' only visible at the end of the list.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Invite Friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard -> Friends
AND user taps on Invite Friends

THEN user should be displayed with the native share sheet, pre-filled with our custom language.

The copy in the share sheet should read “Let's compete on mLB Play” + options where user can send an invite.

title: Inviting Friends - user has no friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has no friends

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard -> Friends
AND user taps on Invite Friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with the native share sheet, pre-filled with our custom language.

The copy in the share sheet should read “Let's compete on mLB Play” + options where user can send an invite.

title: Leaderboard Score State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu - Leaderboard - Friends

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views Friends leaderboard 
AND the user OR at least one of the friends played and has scores
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the leaderboard has a Score State (not empty) and displayed with the list of all current players 
AND the top 3 ranked positions does not have gold/silver/bronze color scheme as the All leaderboard does

title: Social Leaderboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user selects Leaderboard - Friends

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN no friends or self playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN friends are displayed in the leaderboard in inactive state 
AND friends cell is grayed out and no scores are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Self playing, no friends playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Self is displayed in the leaderboard with the current score

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Friends and self playing.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Friends and self are displayed in the leaderboard with the current score

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Friends playing and no self playing.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN only friends are displayed in the leaderboard, no self

title: Cell design
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: AND user views the cell for the friend who is playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees 
* Leaderboard Rank Number
* User Profile Avatar (with outline)
* Username (in white)
* User XP Level (in white)
* Score(in white)
AND places are gray with no gradient
AND badge is oval with a gray background, shadow, and white rank

custom_steps_separated.content: AND user views the cell for the friend who is not playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees 
* User cell is grayed out
* User Profile Avatar (with outline)
* Username (in gray)
* User XP Level (in gray)

title: Yesterday/Today/Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user is on Friends leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Yesterday (Bases)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of friends who played yesterday with the number of bases they earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Today (Bases)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of friends who played today with the number of bases they earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Season (Runs)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of friends who played the game and got the home runs with the number of home run they earned
AND the leaderboard should be defaulted to Today

title: Season leaderboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND user is on Friends leaderboard
custom_expected: THEN users with 0 scores should not be displayed. Only users who earned a home run should be displayed

title: Leaderboard Score State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu - Leaderboard - All

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views All leaderboard 
AND the user OR at least one of the friends played and has scores
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the leaderboard has a Score State (not empty) and displayed with the list of all current players 
AND the top 3 ranked positions  have gold/silver/bronze color scheme as the All leaderboard does

title: Leaderboard Empty States
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens the Leaderboard - All
AND no scores are displayed (before the first game is played)
custom_expected:
THEN user should be displayed with the copy - 

There aren't any scores to display. 
Check back later.

title: Yesterday/Today/Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the DD game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user is on All leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Yesterday (Bases)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of people who played yesterday with the number of bases they earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Today (Bases)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of people who played today with the number of bases they earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Season (Runs)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the list of people who played the game and got the home run with the number of home runs they earned
THEN the leaderboard should be defaulted to Yesterday until contests are scored

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN contests are scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the leaderboard should be defaulted to Today

title: Contest Results card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Predict app installed on device
AND User is logged in
AND user played Diamond Derby

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Diamond Derby in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date (top right corner)
* 'Diamond Derby' logo
* feed copy (separate TC)
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

title: Contest Scored Feed Copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Predict app installed on device
AND User is logged in
AND user played Diamond Derby
custom_steps: WHEN user views the results of Diamond Derby in the Results Feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user had no correct picks and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You did not earn any bases so you remain at [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user had no correct picks and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You did not earn any bases and struck out'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were not scored and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You earned # bases, advancing to [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were scored and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You earned # bases, scoring # runs and advancing to [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were scored and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You earned # bases, scoring # runs and struck out'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were not scored and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You earned # bases and struck out'
